existing_features.title: In the Work Orders page (frontend/src/pages/WorkOrders.tsx), move the 'Work Order' navigation or tab option so that it appears under the 'Verify Application' section instead of being grouped under the 'Verify' section. Ensure the UI reflects this hierarchy clearly and the option functions correctly in its new location.

new_feature_requests.summary: Move 'work order' option in the application to be under 'verify application' section, not 'verify'

projectName: Move 'Work Order' option under 'Verify Application' section in Work Orders page
